attributes.action: UK government to give the people a right to vote on Digital IDs.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the right to vote in a democracy and not be ignored by a government who doesn't want to allow people to have there say on the matter.
We don't live in a communist society the last time I checked we had freedom of speech, if a government  is in a position of power it is supposed to listen to and do the bidding of the people.
attributes.background:
Give the people of the united kingdom the right to choose whether they want a digital ID when the majority of people already carry some form of ID.
A simple YES or NO vote let the people decide

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
